short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Risk Factors, the only carrier vetting tool that analyzes Truckstop’s vast data to deliver a carrier risk summary to your workflow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To make split-second decisions while safeguarding your business, you need the best risk detection and fraud mitigation product on the market—one that’s comprehensive, fast, and simple.
 
Designed for compliance and carrier procurement teams who care about data quality, freshness, and speed, Risk Factors is the only carrier vetting tool that analyzes billions of signals from Truckstop’s propriety, licensed, and public data to deliver a summary of a carrier’s risk indicators in an easy-to-read signal, color-coded for quick comprehension, right to your workflow.
 
Tap into billions of carrier data points. Risk Factors is the only solution that includes IP address risk-detection using Truckstop’s behavioral pattern recognition.

Make an informed carrier decision in seconds. Starting with a color-coded summary, you get the information you need to make an at-a-glance decision about when to vet deeper, strengthen, or discontinue a carrier relationship.

Save time and increase productivity. Risk Factors is the only carrier vetting solution accessible through a Chrome Extension, Outlook add-in, and API, so you can work seamlessly on any web page, Gmail and your TMS.
